publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-286♦ John Scott: Christian Aid Cut the Carbon March—That the Parliament congratulates Christian Aid on its Cut the Carbon march, beginning on 14 July 2007 in Belfast and ending on 2 October 2007 in London, which aims to highlight the impact of global warming on poorer communities across the world and, in particular, the threat of increased drought, disease and food shortages as a result of climate change.
S3M-286 Christian Aid Cut the Carbon March (lodged on 6 July 2007) John Park*
